name: Cerulean Atapetra Conch
description: A cerulean-hued conch whose form closely resembles that of a helmet. It may be one of the oldest creatures on the continent of Teyvat.\nThe Atapetra Conch moves at an astonishingly sluggish pace, which is why they prefer remaining still most of the time. However, after moving into the Realm Within, their tracks can be found all over... How they manage to move themselves around remains a mystery.\nFor reasons unknown, some animals that enter the Realm Within retain their peculiar appearance shaped by the force of kuuvahki. To help Tubby identify them, Paimon has thoughtfully given them new names based on said appearance...
